name: Unidentified_Gamorrean_sow
content:
A female Gamorrean sow was a slave of the Zygerrian Alliance during the High Republic Era. She was sick with a disease with which she infected a human slave in the Zygerrian slave camp. While enslaved to Zygerrian slavers at the same camp, future Nihil Tempest Runner Lourna Dee tried to advocate for the Sow's well-being but was punished by the slavers activating her shock collar for talking. Dee warned their captors that the Sow would get the other slaves sick, lowering their value as "merchandise" to buyers; however, her warning went unheeded and the human slave was infected as well.
The Gamorrean sow appeared in flashbacks in the 2021 audio drama The High Republic: Tempest Runner, written by Cavan Scott and performed by a full voice cast.
